title: Deterministic max pooling in cudnn v6
body_html:
According to http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/machine-learning/cudnn/secure/v6/prod/Doc/cuDNN_v6.0_ReleaseNotes.pdf?autho=1491203214_38b05e2597e10fefeea6c2b7598c70ee&file=cuDNN_v6.0_ReleaseNotes.pdf , cudnn v6 supports deterministic max pooling.

It would be great if PyTorch can also choose max pooling to be deterministic when using cudnn.
body_text:

It would be great if PyTorch can also choose max pooling to be deterministic when using cudnn.
